content.prompt: Which of the following accurately compares the nature of social cleavages in both Nigeria and Mexico?

choices.label: Both countries have a Christian majority and a significant Muslim minority.
Both countries have a homogeneous population with few ethnic minorities.
Both countries feature regional differences divided along socioeconomic lines.
Both countries have significant regional linguistic and religious differences.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
